sentence.text: Fragile X syndrome (FXS), caused by the loss of functional regulation of alternative mRNA splicing, via spliceosome, is a leading cause of autism.

entity.text: regulation of alternative mRNA splicing, via spliceosome

sentence.text: Genetic reduction of cAMP biosynthetic process also ameliorates autism-related symptoms including repetitive behaviour, defective social interaction and audiogenic seizures.
